ing: 2 tablespoons prepared English mustard with turmeric
n: Simple Cream Cheese and Ham Spread
des: "Simple, but flavorful, spread that is great with crackers or celery. Any dipping mustard made with turmeric as the spice factor will work. This addition put the recipe over the top."
ins: Beat cream cheese, ham, green onions, and English mustard together in a bowl. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate 8 hours to overnight.
